Open Source

CloudCoder is free (open source) software distributed under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License v3.

The source is available on GitHub:

https://github.com/cloudcoderdotorg/CloudCoder

Contributions are welcome - just fork the repository, make improvements, and send a pull request.
